def is_cat_near_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):

    symbol cat_near_bathtub=close(cat, bathtub)
    return cat_near_bathtub

behavior move_cat_close_to_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve close(cat, bathtub)

behavior shower_cat_in_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        achieve has_water(bathtub)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub) and inside(cat, bathtub)
        shower_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)

def has_shower_installed(bathtub:item):
    # Determine whether this bathtub has a shower installed
    symbol has_shower=exists shower:item: is_shower(shower) and close(shower,bathtub)
    return has_shower

behavior turn_on_shower(shower:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(shower)
      
behavior shower_cat_in_bathtub(cat:item, bathtub:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(cat, bathtub)
        # Ensure the cat is placed inside the bathtub

        if has_shower_installed(bathtub):
            bind shower: item where:
                is_shower(shower) and close(shower, bathtub)
            turn_on_shower(shower)
            # If the bathtub has a shower installed, turn it on to shower the cat

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub) and id[bathtub]==30
        # Select bathtub with ID 30
        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat) and id[cat]==2055
        # Select the cat with ID 2055
        shower_cat_in_bathtub(cat, bathtub)

behavior apply_water(cat: item, water: item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(cat)

behavior rinse_cat(cat: item, water: item):
    body:
        achieve clean(cat)

behavior __goal__():

        bind cat: item where:
            is_cat(cat)
        bind bathtub: item where:
            is_bathtub(bathtub)
        achieve inside(cat, bathtub)
        apply_water(cat, bathtub)
        rinse_cat(cat, bathtub)
